dcterms:description: A collection of images used for testing the performance of steganography methods, specifically for embedding secret images and analyzing the robustness of the proposed method.

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a comparative study of texture measures, specifically focusing on Local Binary Patterns (LBP) for image representation.

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes color and texture features for image indexing and retrieval, utilized in the context of steganography.
dcterms:title: Gabor features

dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating ensemble classifiers in the context of steganalysis of digital media.
